[This.GetTitledFirstName] tries to live according to the ways of Arthur the Noble. [This.GetSheHeCap] focuses on becoming §YBrave§!, §YGregarious§! and §YKind§!, through the inspiration of this great figure.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] tries to live according to the ways of Her Majesty the Queen, the Eternal Sovereign. [This.GetSheHeCap] focuses on becoming §YProud§!, §YHonest§! and §YJust§!, through the inspiration of this great figure.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] tries to live according to the ways of Laurier the Great Conciliator. [This.GetSheHeCap] focuses on becoming §YTemperate§!, §YDiligent§! and §YPatient§!, through the inspiration of this great figures.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] tries to live according to the ways of Macdonald the Founder. [This.GetSheHeCap] focuses on becoming §YAmbitious§!, §YCruel§! and §YDeceitful§!, through the inspiration of this great figure.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] tries to live according to the ways of Mackenzie the Statesman. [This.GetSheHeCap] focuses on becoming §YShrewd§!, §YCharitable§! and §YSWroth§!, through the inspiration of this great figure.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] tries to live according to the ways of Trudeau the Repatriater. [This.GetSheHeCap] focuses on becoming §YErudite§!, §YAmbitious§! and §YStubborn§!, through the inspiration of this great figure.
